title: Tom Cafe
typeOfFood: International, Western, Take-out, Catering, Swiss, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has vegan choices, so vegans please inquire. Vegetables are grown in the front garden.  Try the meat-free curry. Owner is Swiss and a long time resident of Takayama. He speaks German, English and Japanese. Located 10 minutes from the Takayama station.
